about_the_game:
Jurard Run is a short side-scroller shooter game featuring Jurard T Rexford of holostars, the leader of the ARMIS unit!

Shoot through corruption beasts and battle against other holostars members on the way. Can you survive until the end? Or will this dino face extinction once again?

FIGHT 4 UNIQUE BOSSES!

Battle against 4 bosses with unique and creative mechanics, with telegraphed attacks inspired by MMO raids.

SIMPLE AND FUN!

Destroy incoming corruption beasts and dodge enemy attacks while shooting. It's very simple, but can also be very challenging!

SELECT YOUR DIFFICULTY!

Play casually in the normal difficulty with checkpoints for each bosses, or challenge yourself in the merciless difficulty with harder mechanics and no checkpoints!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WARNING: This game contains some flashing lights. Player discretion is advised.

This game is published under CCMC Corp(※1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(※2)

This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".

Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

※1. About CCMC Corp.

CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (e.g. steam) including examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.

※2. About "holo Indie"

holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.

It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.

For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

name: Jurard Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A short side-scroller shooter game featuring Jurard T Rexford of holostars! Fight against corruption beasts and 4 other holostars members in this simple boss-rush game!
